# dionysus-trainer

This is just a test release. 

# Installation

From [PyPi](https://pypi.org/project/dl/)
```
pip install dl
```

```bash
python3 -m pip install git+https://git@github.com/felix-ha/dl.git

# or
git clone https://github.com/felix-ha/dl.git
cd dl
python3 -m pip install -e .
```
